TEAM LEADER OF PUBLISHERS MANAGERS

–§–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç: #—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–∞ –∏–ª–∏ #–æ—Ñ–∏—Å
–õ–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è: #limassol, #cyprus
–ó–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å: –ü–æ–ª–Ω–∞—è
–û–ø—ã—Ç: –æ—Ç 4 –ª–µ—Ç

–ó–∞—Ä–ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞: 4000
–ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è: Centro
–û—Ç—Ä–∞—Å–ª—å: Ad-network

We‚Äôre an ambitious Ad Network with a clear mission: to empower advertisers with high quality, exclusive traffic and help publishers access high paying deals, creating a win-win eco system. As part of the Centro Holding family, we‚Äôre in an exciting phase of rapid growth, building a strong, talented team to become the go-to company where advertisers and publishers of all sizes grow together through exclusive, high-value partnerships.

–¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è:

- Minimum 4 years of experience as a Publisher Manager, at least 2 years in a leadership position.
- Experience with CPM, CPC and flat deals is mandatory.
- Proven experience in hunting direct publishers with own sites is a must.
- Driven, enthusiastic team player and drive for achieving results.
- Strong communication skills in an international environment.
- English level from upper-intermediate to advanced.

–û–±—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏:

- Achieve sales targets and establish long-term, mutually beneficial partnerships
- Daily and monthly monitor and analyze key performance metrics to track the success and identify areas for improvement
- Be a leader for the team of publisher manager: hire, onboard, train, share experience, support and oversee reporting
- Collaborate with the advertisers' managers team and work in synergy to achieve the project's common goals
- Attend industry conferences and industry events (when required)
- Stay informed about industry trends, competitive landscape, and emerging technologies

–£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è:

- Competitive salary + bonuses for results;
- Comprehensive relocation support for you and your family to Cyprus;
- School/kindergarten support program for kids;
- Time Off: paid annual leave, paid sick leave annually and personal days;
- Private medical insurance;
- Sport program for fitness and wellness
- Educational programs to expand your knowledge and skills;
- Team-building activities and opportunities to attend industry events;
- Fun, exciting, and memorable corporate parties to celebrate our successes.
